member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.Data.IDisplayInfoData.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets the display name of the object.

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.Data.IDisplayInfoData.Description
member.summary: Gets the description of the object.

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.Data.IDisplayInfoData.Icon

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.IDisplayInfo.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets the display name of the object.

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.IDisplayInfo.Description
member.summary: Gets the description of the object.

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.IDisplayInfo.Icon
member.summary: Gets the icon associated with the object.

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.IDisplayInfo.Stack
member.summary: Gets the current stack value for display purposes, or if no stack is defined.

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.IDisplayInfo.Level
member.summary: Gets the current level value for display purposes, or if the level is not set.

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.IDisplayInfo.Cooldown
member.summary: Gets the cooldown duration, in seconds, for display purposes, or if no cooldown is defined.

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.IDisplayInfo.CoolDownMax
member.summary: Gets the maximum cooldown duration, in seconds, for display purposes, or if no maximum cooldown is defined.

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.IDisplayInfo.ChargeCooldown
member.summary: Gets the charge cooldown duration, in seconds, for display purposes, or if no IDisplayInfo cooldown is defined.

member.name: P:GameCore.DisplayInfo.IDisplayInfo.ChargeCooldownMax
member.summary: Gets the maximum charge cooldown duration, in seconds, for display purposes, or if no maximum cooldown is defined.
